summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North 45th Street from Whitman Avenue to Fremont Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8264 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
